title: Bitcoin Drop Ends Up Liquidating $500M Bullish Bets in Early Asia Trading
contentSnippet: Binance, Hyperliquid, and Bybit saw over $160 million in liquidations each, with longs making up almost 90% of the total.

title: Dogecoin Slumps 9% Amid Bitcoin Weakness. Is a Larger Dump Coming?
contentSnippet: The launch of DOGE ETFs from Grayscale and Bitwise saw only $2.16 million in inflows, failing to attract expected institutional interest.

title: Bitcoin's Monthly MACD Flashes Red: Echoes of Past Bear Markets
contentSnippet: The key indicator's negative flip indicates downside volatility ahead.

title: XRP Slides 7% as Technical Breakdown Opens Move to $1.80
contentSnippet: Despite expanding institutional infrastructure around XRP, short-term flows turned sharply bearish.

title: Bitcoin slides below $86,500, wiping out $144 billion in crypto market cap
contentSnippet: Still, analysts predict upside from Fed's December rate cut decision, with the odds of a 25 basis point cut having increased recently.

title: China To Intensify Crackdown on Virtual Currencies, Including Stablecoins: Report
contentSnippet: Virtual currencies lack the legal status of fiat money, Chinese officials said during an intra-agency meeting on Friday.

title: Crypto exchange volume drops to $1.6 trillion in November, lowest since June
contentSnippet: Centralized exchanges' spot monthly volume fell to $1.59 trillion in November, down from $2.17 trillion in October.

title: Asia Morning Briefing: Bitcoin Slides on Japan Bond Spike and BOJ Hike Bets
contentSnippet: Short-term Japanese yields reached their highest level since 2008, strengthening the yen and pressuring leveraged crypto positions during Hong Kong trading hours.

title: The Funding: VCs discuss the crypto correction and what’s next
contentSnippet: Crypto VCs explain what’s behind the crypto correction, whether a bottom is forming, and what they expect next.

title: Bitcoin, Ether, XRP Slide as December Begins With 'Yearn Incident'
contentSnippet: Major cryptocurrencies traded lower in early Asia as DeFi platform Yearn noted at "incident" in its yETH pool.

title: $3 million in ETH sent to Tornado Cash following apparent attack on Yearn’s yETH
contentSnippet: The complex attack took place in a single transaction, and appears to have involved liquid staking tokens from across the Ethereum ecosystem.

title: What 'mNAV' Really Means for Bitcoin Treasury Companies — and Where It Falls Short
contentSnippet: NYDIG’s research head questions how mNAV is used to assess bitcoin treasuries, arguing it masks key risks tied to capital structure and equity dilution.

title: CoinShares withdraws US spot ETF filings for XRP, Solana and Litecoin ahead of Nasdaq listing
contentSnippet: The withdrawals come ahead of CoinShares' planned U.S. public listing via a $1.2 billion SPAC merger with Vine Hill Capital.

title: Ethena-incubated DEX Terminal Finance abandons launch after Converge chain fails to materialize
contentSnippet: The Converge blockchain was scheduled to launch in the second quarter of 2025, but its launch "doesn't appear to be planned for the near future."

title: Priced at Zero: How Brazil’s Méliuz Turned to Bitcoin to Escape a Treasury Trap
contentSnippet: The company adopted a bitcoin treasury plan by deploying a strategy inspired by Metaplanet, with 66% shareholder approval, to mitigate negative returns from government bonds.

title: The Biggest Games Releasing in December 2025
contentSnippet: There are a few more big games releasing before the year's up, including Metroid Prime 4: Beyond and Marvel Cosmic Invasion.

title: Michael Saylor Sunday Change-Up Suggests New Announcement Coming Monday
contentSnippet: The executive chairman of bitcoin treasury firm Strategy teased a switch from orange dots to green dots in what's become his routine cheeky Sunday X post.

title: I Made an AI Speak Every Century of English—It Ended With a Message From the Year 15,000
contentSnippet: I pushed a chatbot through several millennia of linguistic evolution. An AI from the year 5000 lectured me about pronouns.

title: China’s central bank reaffirms crypto ban, flags stablecoin risks following multi-agency meeting
contentSnippet: Beijing has moved in recent months to quell some digital asset activity in Hong Kong, like real-world asset tokenization and stablecoin issuance.

title: Visa taps Aquanow to expand stablecoin settlement across Europe, Middle East, and Africa
contentSnippet: Visa's stablecoin settlement monthly volume has scaled to a $2.5 billion annualized run rate, according to the payments giant's CEO.

title: Spot bitcoin, ether ETFs recover momentum with first net-positive inflow week since October
contentSnippet: Spot Solana ETFs, which broke a 21-day inflow streak on Wednesday, recovered from their stumble with modest inflows on Friday as well.

title: UK Budget Confirms New Crypto Reporting Rules from January 1
contentSnippet: The UK government expects to raise $417 million in extra tax as UK-registered crypto exchanges are required to record customer details.

title: OpenAI Confirms Data Breach—Here's Who Is Impacted
contentSnippet: OpenAI said a Mixpanel breach exposed API user metadata—and urged customers to watch for phishing attacks.

title: 'Bad Joke': FC Barcelona Criticized for $22 Million Deal with Samoan Crypto Firm ZKP
contentSnippet: A former FC Barcelona board member hit out at the deal with ZKP on social media, highlighting the firm's “unknown” ownership.

title: Stablecoin Giant Tether to Shutter Uruguay Bitcoin Mining Operation
contentSnippet: USDT stablecoin issuer Tether is halting its Bitcoin mining operations in Uruguay due to high energy costs, local media has reported.

title: BitMine and Bitcoin Miners' Stocks Surge as BTC, Ethereum Recover
contentSnippet: Crypto-related equities like BitMine and leading Bitcoin mining stocks are jumping as Bitcoin and Ethereum regain key levels.

title: Myriad Moves: Predictors Turn Bullish on Bitcoin Rebounding to $100K
contentSnippet: Top markets on Myriad this week include predictions on Bitcoin's next price move, whether Brian Armstrong will appear UpOnly, and more.

title: The Daily: Upbit flags private key vulnerability, MegaETH to return funds from pre-deposit campaign, Do Kwon requests 5-year jail cap, and more
contentSnippet: The following article is adapted from The Block’s newsletter, The Daily, which comes out on weekday afternoons.

title: Monero and Zcash Diverge in Double-Digit Weekly Swing as Privacy Coins Rotate
contentSnippet: Monero surged 23% this week on futures speculation while Zcash fell equally, reflecting leverage and timing within the privacy narrative.

title: Trump White House ‘World’s Most Corrupt Crypto Startup Operation’: House Democrats
contentSnippet: President Trump and his family made $800 million from sales of cryptocurrencies in the first half of the year, according to a new report.

title: Animoca eyes stablecoins, AI, DePIN as it expands focus in 2026: Exec
contentSnippet: Animoca Brands’ Keyvan Peymani says the Web3 gaming company is exploring all segments of the crypto industry, including DePIN, DeFi and AI.

title: Conor McGregor calls out Khabib over NFTs, gets shut down by ZachXBT
contentSnippet: The former UFC champion tried to launch his own celebrity memecoin, REAL, in April, but the project failed to gain traction.

title: Memecoin market sinks to 2025 low as $5B wiped out in a day
contentSnippet: Both memecoins and NFTs have plunged to their weakest levels since early 2025, with traders pulling back from speculative assets across the board.

title: NFT and memecoin markets recover after month-long crypto slump
contentSnippet: NFTs posted selective gains led by blue chips, while memecoins rallied broadly across major names in a sentiment-driven rebound.

title: NFTs hit the brakes: Market cap tanks 46% in just 30 days
contentSnippet: CoinGecko data shows the NFT market value has nearly halved in a month, with even top collections like BAYC and CryptoPunks losing ground.

title: Valve’s Counter-Strike 2 update crashes $5.8B economy, revives NFT debate
contentSnippet: A major update to Counter-Strike 2’s item mechanics wiped nearly $2 billion from its $5.8 billion skin market, igniting debate over central control in gaming.

title: Coinbase splashes $25M to revive a podcast from the last bull run
contentSnippet: Coinbase has paid $25 million for an NFT that compels the once popular crypto podcast UpOnly to restart. Bull market vibes anyone?

title: OpenSea rejects pivot from NFTs, says it’s evolving to ‘trade everything’
contentSnippet: OpenSea CEO Devin Finzer says the platform isn’t abandoning NFTs but expanding into a universal onchain trading hub.

title: Swiss regulator GESPA takes aim at FIFA’s NFT platform in formal complaint
contentSnippet: Switzerland’s nationwide gambling authority said user rewards on the platform feature the element of chance, categorizing them as gambling.

title: Fear returns to the crypto market as $230B vanishes overnight
contentSnippet: Investor sentiment turned sharply bearish as crypto’s fear index plunged to 28, and $230 billion in value evaporated in a single day.
